snippet: The temporary asylum status of Edward J. Snowden, the former National Security Agency contractor accused of leaking secret documents, has expired in Russia.
abstract: Temporary asylum status of former National Security Agency contractor Edward J Snowden expires in Russia he is expected to remain in country until authorities decide on his application for an extension.
lead_paragraph: The temporary asylum status of Edward J. Snowden, the former National Security Agency contractor accused of leaking secret documents, has expired in Russia.

headline.main: Russia: Snowden Waiting for Extension of Asylum
headline.print_headline: Russia: Snowden Waiting for Extension of Asylum
